website_summaries.verdict: An organic solution that works well for cats and dogs.
pros: This USDA certified organic hemp oil not only reduces stress but can also soothe pain and increase appetite
There are no additives or unnatural ingredients, just 300 mg of hemp oil
Can easily be given to cats by applying it to food
cons: A few customers reported that their cats became sick after taking the hemp oil

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat was having seizures 10-12 times a day, the vet wasn’t able to help and said to just put her down. The day we started using this they stopped, and we’ve 2 weeks seizure free. It truly works, I can’t believe how well.
customer_reviews.author: shannon@eckerd

customer_reviews.title: I got a new puppy, 2 months ago, ...
customer_reviews.text: I got a new puppy, 2 months ago, and the neighbors in my apartment complex were complaining that my Brutus was barking and whining when I'm at work. I was about to find a place for him to be adopted until I starting reading about natural puppy calming. This hemp oil has helped me keep my little Brutus! He doesn't whine when I leave, and I haven't had the pleasure of knocking neighbors at my door the last couple nights. I'm so stoked!! You're on notice to buy this miracle oil!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Lim

customer_reviews.title: I love how it is 100% Hemp Seed Oil and isn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this hemp oil for my cats because of the USDA Approval of the product. I love how it is 100% Hemp Seed Oil and isn’t mixed up with anything else. Anyway, I gave this to our most skittish cat of the litter last night. Possibly a coincidence, but the little guy decided to play nice and cuddled with the family. This rarely ever happens. I was pleasantly surprised. Overall, I’m pleased and definitely will come back for another order very soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: this is great hemp oil. my bulldog used to have monthly seizures In clusters. since adding this oil to her food. she has gone 5 months without a seizure. I'm not saying it's a miracle cure, but whatever relief she can get is a miracle to us.
customer_reviews.author: Leann

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase...recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: "This hemp oil came across my FB feed and I decided to check it out. My 10 y.o. Westie, Niko suddenly quit eating and was getting weaker every day. I did some prior research and found that hemp seed oil helps pets with diminished appetites. However, it is all natural and gives no side effects like traditional medication. It's only been a couple of days, but I can say that Niko has been regularly eating, and I can see the spark in his eyes again! We will continue with the suggested treatment. I'm so happy now as I know I have more quality days with my Westie Bestie!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for your Anxious Pets
customer_reviews.text: Seems to help my kitten out when I leave the house- and i’m super appreciative. Now he is no longer marking his territory or scratching up any furniture. I put it in his food, as putting it in water seems like a waste, and he doesn’t taste a difference. If anything, he likes it more. Thanks guys. Prompt delivery and amazing product. And it really works!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tayler Kiele Burket

customer_reviews.title: Huge difference in my aging dog!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old dog was showing signs of sun-downers. Yes it's a thing. In the evenings she would get a panicked look her face and start pacing. She wouldn't sleep through the night without tranquilizers. I know there had to be a better alternative. Since using Healthy Pets Hemp oil for dogs, her pacing has stopped and she sleeps through the night. She's more mobile now too, able to jump up on the couch again. The difference in the last few months is amazing. We thought this summer was going to be her last, but she's so much happier now. She's still a senior dog, but now she's back to enjoying life again. Thank you Healthy Pets!
customer_reviews.author: Aviva

customer_reviews.title: Used for German Shepherd
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old GSD has severe separation anxiety and epilepsy. After using this oil we have noticed a significant improvement. We were recently able to leave him with family for 8 days while we were out of the country and he tolerated the change wonderfully. I'm not sure if this oil is intended as a treatment for epilepsy but we have also noticed a huge decrease in his seizure activity. He was having sometimes multiple seizures a day and he has now been seizure free for almost a month.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Best seizure medication I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: My Dachshund has severe seizures on a weekly bases before we started medicating him first with Pet CBD, then with Rick Simpson oil. Both worked great reducing seizures to every 3 weeks but up to 7 seizures in that one day. Since starting Healthy pets he has not had more than 3 in one day and the severity is down. I hope they don’t start charging more. Don’t want to have to find another medication
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wasted my money on
customer_reviews.text: Seems not to work for my dogs anxiety. He still scared the same as he was. I wasted my money on this
customer_reviews.author: Ron b.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with cats!!!
customer_reviews.text: Be wary of this in cats. Hemp oil is high in Omega 3 and those are not processed very well in felines. It builds up in the liver. There is SO much information out there it's scary. After much reading, I decided to go with Charlotte's Web that is an extract in an olive oil suspension, not actual hemp seed oil.
customer_reviews.author: maw

customer_reviews.title: Decent product / weird flavoring choice
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to be effective, when I can get my cat to consume it. But for some reason, someone chose to sweeten it, rather than use a carrier oil that would be compatible with cat food (cod liver oil, etc.) Adding sweeteners was a red flag to my cat, because it drastically changed the taste of her food, and eventually, she stopped eating it when she smelled the hemp oil. Seriously, make it savory - preferably fish or chicken flavored, and it will be easier to administer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money! This product did not have any noticeable effect on my 2 Shih Tzu's :(
customer_reviews.text: I had hopes for this product after reading all of the glowing reviews. I dosed my dogs 4 different times and no effect whatsoever. They are both way too hyper and 1 has a severe incessant barking problem. He is my Rescue Dog so I really wanted him to have some relief. I don't recommend this Hemp oil, but I'm glad it seems to be working for other pets (based on the reviews).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Our little dachshund mix has a spinal problem like her purebred cousins. The hemp oil helps her to move and keep her active. Without the exercise, she cannot continue to activate her muscle to support her back. This product allows her to be active and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Satomi Mackay

customer_reviews.title: Do not reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Made my dog throw up and had zero effects. Wasted purchase. Concerns about safety.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this to any dog owner, I didn't start putting this in my dog's food until recently, now he wont eat his food with out it. he's 12 and going blind, I know this will help. it also has a calming effect, so if you have a hyper pet. this works good, Harley is a miniature Dachshund, and he is pretty healthy for his age. I recommend this product to anyone who has an ailing/ageing pet. I think it really helps as an anti-inflammatory also. Stop giving your animals chemicals , try this natural product.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: An old dog gets some pep in her step
customer_reviews.text: This hemp oil is odorless and nearly clear. We drop it right onto her dinner each night and she definitely has responded. At nearly 11 years old, she’s not as active as she used to be, but since starting this product she has been able to walk comfortably twice a day with her adopted siblings and enjoys spending more time in the yard. It’s obvious she feels better physically!
customer_reviews.author: emily g.

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first. I have a 13 year old lab who at this point we are just trying to make comfortable with her arthritis. A lot of the prescribed meds for arthritis are actually harmful to a dog’s organs or in our case not effective. It took a few days for this to start working, but it definitely does work. Our lab, while not perfect, does much better. Pants a whole lot less. I attribute it to this hemp oil. I certainly will be purchasing it again due to how effective it has been for our dog.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: This causes my dog to throw up.
customer_reviews.text: That's right, I didn't find this to be the "miracle in a bottle,' that many reviewers stated. within 1-2 hours after taking this, my dog threw up all of her food. Multiple times. I'd be very hesitant buying anything like this, and putting it into my pets food, without knowing far more about it.
customer_reviews.author: Swifty

customer_reviews.title: Works Well for Anxious Cats
customer_reviews.text: My one cat is a jerk, my other is super anxious. I've been dosing them both for a week, the anxious one seems noticeably less anxious, the jerk is a little bit less of a jerk. I think it works well for the price - CBD oil worked a bit better for them both but this is still good. It would be nice if the dropper had measurements on it so I didn't have to guesstimate how much I was giving them.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa L

customer_reviews.title: We like it!
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's been almost 2 weeks that we ran out, and honestly, I think it has been helping my 14-year-old German Shorthaired Pointer. She's pretty spry for her age, but arthritis has been getting the best of her as of late. I have her on Dasuquin with MSM which has been a life saver, but I have to say that she does seem a bit stiffer and more jittery than she was during the month and a half I had her on the hemp seed oil. I'll definitely order it again, though CBD oil would be just as nice (if not better), it's much harder to get our paws on in the midwest :( Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Josh C.

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT for my elderly dog!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 15 and was beginning to have problems with inflammation and arthritis so I started researching different natural products. Hemp oil has been AMAZING for her and she is completely healthy now and no longer on arthritis medication😊😊😊 And the taste is so subtle that she doesn’t realize it’s in her food! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Seth Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Pets Are So Chill Now!
customer_reviews.text: We have two cats. One has always been skittish, the other, aggressive. After about 1/2 of the bottle added to their food over a week or so, these cats are totally chill! They love it when we add Patchouli Oil to the diffuser, and prefer long cuts of the Grateful Dead on the Amazon Echo! Seriously, though. both cats are more "even" and friendly, and one stopped vomiting a couple times per week. Not a scientific conclusion, just noticeable changes in behavior and health.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Pangracs

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to help my dog’s anxiety, but it did absolutely nothing. I guess it can’t work for every animal.
customer_reviews.author: Lgoonie

customer_reviews.title: we are so thankful for this amazing find
customer_reviews.text: Our 9 year old German Police Dog/Malamute rescue developed arthritis in one hip. We just recently began using the Pet Hemp Oil to relieve pain and it has proven to do much more than that. She feels better and rests much more comfortably through the night. She seems much more relaxed and is back to her usual walk and play routines and seems to be very aware that her broth containing the oil is something that helps her which she readily consumes! We are so grateful to have this available to help our beloved companion!
customer_reviews.author: C. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Hemp Seed Oil not full spectrum
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting full spectrum hemp oil made from the whole plant and not just the seeds. This was purchased for my cat who is suffering from nasal cancer but it does not work nearly as well as the whole plant oil that I have purchased from another supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: My family had been telling me about CBD oil for pets for months, but I was skeptical. Right away I could see a difference in my older, arthritic dog. He had more spunk and was able to move more comfortably. I then gave it to my other old dog that has anxiety. BINGO! It worked for her too. Next I'm going to give it to my lab for his itching. Hopefully it will benefit him as well. THANK YOU TO HEALTHY PETS!
customer_reviews.author: Dell

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something natural to help my dog stay calm and through research I found that many people say that hemp oil works. I then looked at the products on the market and liked that Healthy Pets brand is made and tested in the USA. It’s expensive but well worth it. I put it in his biscuit at night and he really is less anxious through the night. Plus the addd benefit is that he has painful arthritis and the product seems to help that too. If your dog is suffering from either ailment, I would recommend that you try the product
customer_reviews.author: John DTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Saved my dogs life.
customer_reviews.text: My pup almost died at 10weeks of age bc she couldn't keep anything down. she looked like a skeleton and we couldn't find a food she could properly digest. Tried this after finding a food that she could partially digest. She hasn't vomited once since we started adding this product to her diet. 1 week later she has gained 7lbs and is almost totally caught up tp the size she is supposed to be! I know this bc she sees her brother routinely. She is now happy, healthy and strong! also, there is no taste or odor that i could notice. thank you thank you thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiana Maranville

customer_reviews.title: Helped relieve anxiety for my chiweenie
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent choice to help my chiweenie with her separation anxiety. I adopted Lady this past May and whenever I would leave home to go to work, she would whine and bark. I didn’t want to get complaints from the neighbors, so I tried this hemp oil out and it I noticed a difference in about two weeks. It worked great! She has calmed down and no longer whines when I leave. I use it once a day and incorporate it into her breakfast in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do the trick
customer_reviews.text: This seems to make my Shiba Inu calmer (not completely zonked out but calm none the less). My husband and I usually keep her in the kennel during the day because she gets destructive when we're at work or out for more than 10 minutes. So I decided to test the first day I gave her the oil to see if she chew the carpet. She didnt, so we've been keeping her out. There was only one day we missed the dose and she tore up the carpet on that day. I'm giving it 4 stars because of the price. You know they're keeping it high since cbd/hemp is still not widely used.
customer_reviews.author: Arashi

customer_reviews.title: My dog and I thank you
customer_reviews.text: I have a 13 yr old mini poodle with skin issues. A few weeks ago after bathing I found a large fluid filled water blister in ear fold. Hughe! I know I shouldn't have burst it but I did. It was difficult and had a small weird "head" on it. Anyway cleaned it and put antibiotic ointment on it. Next day it still looked nasty so I dropped some hemp oil on it. Suppose to be good for wounds. Two days later it was entirely gone and skin area looks normal! Will never be without this great oil and recommend it but caution to follow directions from mfg!
customer_reviews.author: M. Wabich

customer_reviews.title: This oil helps keep the fur-kin happy & healthy
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe I'm almost out of this product! I will definitely reorder this oil for my pets. Taking care of a lot of pets require a calm and healthy environment. This oil helps keep the fur-kin happy & healthy! Yay! I was very pleased with this product and will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: K.M. Brunner

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy Item!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and I love it! I use it on my 2 dogs and it is amazing. I would highly recommend this to other dog owners. This helped my puppy with his anxiety and helped my older dog with his joints. He now chases his baby brother all around the house non stop!!
customer_reviews.author: Zina Gray

customer_reviews.title: Got my dog back
customer_reviews.text: My 11 yo miniature schnauzer had problem moving around because of her back legs, her activity and love of life was dwindling you could see it in her eyes. A few days of administering the oil, her eyes are bright again, loving to go out and playing. I got my girl back. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: GiseleS

customer_reviews.title: My Pups think it's a treat
customer_reviews.text: My pups line up when it is time for their hemp oil treatment. They willing open wide and lick away as the dropper lets loose the yumminess. They think their mawmaw is the greatest thing in the world when it is time for that nightly liquid treat! There has been a huge improvement in both my pups. My 9 year old acts like a 3 year old again playing and romping and enjoying walks. And my 3 year old who has a bad ligament problem in his front leg forgets all about it and plays like there is no tomorrow again. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised to see this stuff actually has an effect on my 18 yr old dog. He’s been having tooth issues and hasn’t been eating much. And as a result losing weight. We have to wait another couple days to take him to the vet and my mom saw something mentioning hemp oil can help a dog regain their appetite and it sure did. He’s not eating a lot, but he’s definitely eating more than before we started giving him the drops.
customer_reviews.author: Remo Williams

customer_reviews.title: It works very quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, but I could see result almost right away.
customer_reviews.author: Baaabooo

customer_reviews.title: Saved my dog from being so afraid. ❤️
customer_reviews.text: My dog Jackson is 12 years old. Every New Years Eve he has terrible fright from the fireworks. I have tried asking my neighbors not to pop firecrackers, essential oil, an calming meds from the vet. Nothing worked. I ordered Healthy Pets Hemp Oil and put a dose on a dog treat. This was the best thing I have ever used. I'm am so thankful for this. He was calm. If I left the room he did too but he was not shaking, vomiting and trying to climb on me. I am a happy dog mom.
customer_reviews.author: JenB

customer_reviews.title: Thought this was CBD
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was purchasing CDB oil for my pets, it smells nothing like CBD and to send back for a refund you have to pay for return shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it is so easy to give to my Sheba...she's a 15 1/2 year old American Eskimo and hates taking pills. She doesn't mind taking this at all. I give it to her at night, and she seems to be moving better in the mornings and is a little frisky sometimes now. I'm not sure if it's helping her eyesight, but I can definitely tell a difference in her overall behavior.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Anne Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Oil
customer_reviews.text: Our pup suffers from anxiety and after my daughter left for college it got worse. We bought the Heslthy Pets Hemp Oil for her and it helped immediately. Half of a dropper in the morning and she has been a different pup. This is an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe of Benton City

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that has major anger issues. She will take it out on our other cats and us. I give her 1/4 of a dropper full every day. It isn't a miracle cure but it does make her act more like a normal cat. She still gets a nasty temper from time to time but overall she is much more tolerable and over all friendlier. I have a small dog that I tried it on and won't do it again. He is an older dog so that might have had something to do with it. He sat facing the wall for over an hour and acted like he did't know what was going on.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine C.

customer_reviews.title: Good oil for the price
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a little over a week. My dog is 15 almost 16 and not getting around so well. She doesn't like most hemp oil because it does have a funny smell. This doesn't have a smell. She seems to eat her food when I put it on there. My biggest complaint is that the dropper doesn't have marks. I've tried to measure according to the instructions, but I'm not sure how accurate it is, so I'm counting drops. I don't necessarily notice huge improvements in her health other than the days I don't give it to her, she's more anxious and limps more.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi B

customer_reviews.title: what a relief
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I adopted a senior dog. He is wonderful! But he came with anxiety issues. He even had seizure-like tremors. Most had cleared up over time as he became secure with us. But the most difficult one, his night time pacing and sleeplessness..shaking and occasional tremors, remained. Needless to say, it impacted the whole family. I did not want to put him on harsh medication. So, I decided upon research to try hemp oil. Since using the hemp oil he is sleeping. He occasionally wakes up, but a pat on the head and he goes back to sleep. No shaking, no fear, no tremors, no pacing. It's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Hard to dose
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are to use a certain # of drops, but no dropper is included. Does everyone have a spare dropper sitting around but me? And do all droppers dispense the same size drop?
customer_reviews.author: Steve E

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent works well on dogs with arthritis along with anxiety and dry skin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I use 2 to 4 drops on my cats paw where they lick it off. Started off with 1 drop then increased slowly to be sure it would not make them ill. I have a territorial cat and I use this when she picks or is getting picked on and it has so far made it much better. BTW I tried it and, it is effective.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Horning

customer_reviews.title: Caused our dog to have seizures
customer_reviews.text: Caused our dog to have seizures. Our dog had never had seizures until taking this product.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN S.

customer_reviews.title: 19 year old cat is thriving!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product as I have had much success with improving the health of our cat who will be 19 years old in just a few days. She had reached a point where I was soon going to be faced with putting her to sleep. After reading the reviews of this product, I decided to try it. I am so glad I did. She is very alert, moves around and uses the potty properly after taking this oil, where before she would sleep all the time and had issues with going potty in the wrong places. We are on the second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Hall

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Medicine for Canines
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old dog peps up and really seems like a puppy again with this. My 3 year old anxiety dog has calmed down. They both enjoy the taste and can't wait to eat their food. I'm not sure what it taste like but they both lick and lick their bowls. The older dog has many ailments and this is like his wonder med. I highly recommend this medicine for any type of ailment your furry friend may have.
customer_reviews.author: margaret check

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works fast
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. I can actually see my dogs relax a few minutes after giving it to them. It seems like they don't mind the taste. Thank you for making a product that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Michellejacks

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog was so sick and we couldn't figure out what was wrong with her. We think she have cancer. I found this online and started giving it to her daily. She started acting more normal everyday. I am about put and am ordering more. Love this oil!
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for our 12 yr old pom who has a severe collapsed trachea and get very stressed out when he starts coughing or wheezing and is unable to catch his breathe. I felt that this would be a long shot that it would help him, HOWEVER after his first dose it calmed him down and he was able to breathe with out issue!! This is so easy to administer and it works wonderfully that I always try to keep it on hand even when if go on vacation. So would I recommend this product, absolutely without question!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Ring Stress
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior dog I show in agility. She has always been timid around stressful surroundings. I recently knocked a jump over behind her in the ring and this really stressed her out. She would take obstacles, but not the jumps. I used Healthy Pets Hemp Oil on her before taking her into the ring and she took most of the jumps. It really helped her to de-stress in the ring. I also use this for my other senior dog for long car rides. She loves to go but gets bored and starts to whine loudly. I have started giving her the oil before our trips and she does not whine as much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I AM SO HAPPY I PURCHASED THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 13 year old Golden/Lab was really starting to struggle with her hip/joint issues. She was lethargic and would no longer attempt to go upstairs but instead stand at the bottom and cry. I read the reviews and decided to give this a try. She still has a few bad days every now and the but the difference that this has made for her is wonderful!! She is playful again and will actually go upstairs on her own without coaxing! I am so grateful for this product and won’t be without it as long as I am blessed to have our precious girl! Definitely $ well spent!!!
customer_reviews.author: KCat

customer_reviews.title: Works almost straight away to ease dogs general discomfort!
customer_reviews.text: I was caustiously optimistic about the prospect of hemp oil remedies for pets, AND now I am convinced that it works! My 10 yr old lab has arthritis and general aging discomfort. The very FIRST dose, within the hour, she behaved and looked more relaxed, was walking around and getting up much easier and seemed to be a much younger dog. She has been sleeping much more sounder and in general just behaving much more comfortable. BEST decision to purchase and use this product. WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMNED. No noticeable bad side effects at all.
customer_reviews.author: Batak

customer_reviews.title: It really helps to calm a pet!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me to calm my doges during fireworks. I have continued to purchase from Healthy Pets on Amazon because it also works well for older pets when over night company is at my home. Amazon was cheaper than my local pet store. This just helps my pooches and I to enjoy company more. I also think it helps one dog who suffers from a little back pain when it flares up!!
customer_reviews.author: poochiemama

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: Made my old dogs more active again, but they were pooping all of the time. It was the only change in their diet and when I stopped giving it to them, it stopped. I couldn’t keep waking up to let them out several times at night. It works though.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Kitty puke ain't no joke!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to dispense directly to my cat and he doesn't mind the taste. We purchased this to help our cat with travel sickness. I can't tell if it has really helped or not, but it certainly hasn't hurt!
customer_reviews.author: Lexiqute

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My little chihuahua was attacked by a loose pitbull in our apartments a few months ago. He had some damage done to his legs and knees and when I adopted him just two months prior, had been morbidly obese. It has been very hard to exercise him without aggravating his injuries, and as the weather cools, he's been especially sore. We've given him two doses a day for about a week or so now, and already I see a difference! He is a little sprier, runs a little more when walking, and is more playful. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: My pup liked the taste
customer_reviews.text: Received very quickly. My little maltipoo doesn’t get seizures everyday, but we want to prevent future seizures because they drain her energy. I gave my pup a few drops and she enjoyed the taste by constantly licking her lips. So far so good, later review to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Effective relief for arthritic dog
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed to help my elderly shepherd while she was suffering from arthritic hips. I also used this during the fireworks festivities for all of my crew ( 2 adult dogs and 1 young pup), and it really made a difference for helping them to stay calmer than normal. I have since purchased another bottle of same. Thank healthy pets.
customer_reviews.author: beach mambo

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t seen anxiety benefit yet
customer_reviews.text: Claims to help with anxiety but I haven’t seen that benefit for my old Labrador. In fact, she won’t touch any food it’s on so I have to force her to take it which causes more anxiety in the process. Haven’t seen a huge pain relief benefit yet but that may be because I don’t give it to her 3x day. It’s too much of a stressful process at this point. Wish I would have spent the extra money on a good quality CBD oil, at least that would help stimulate appetite in addition to pain and anxiety relief.
customer_reviews.author: Tagen

customer_reviews.title: My cat is much improved
customer_reviews.text: My cat is older and has been having a difficult time moving around. She was limping and having trouble balancing. I assumed she was having an arthritis issue. I changed her to a gluten free canned food for older cats, and now I add five drops of the hemp oil to three of her servings each day. She is no longer limping and balances well. Since I started this a few months ago she has gotten much better and no set backs. She doesn't seem to notice the taste and I am most pleased to have found an organic remedy for her.
customer_reviews.author: Radiant Splendor

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t work at all... I would like my money back
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Leyva

customer_reviews.title: Glad I gave this product a tru
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to be very helpful in relieving symptoms my dog has due to aging. She has a awful hacking cough and the medicine prescribed by the vet did little good to elevate it, however, when I started giving her the hemp oil it seems to have lessened and some days she doesn’t cough at all !!️👏
customer_reviews.author: Cathy D

customer_reviews.title: Dropper kept coming apart
customer_reviews.text: The clear part of the dropper constantly comes apart from the part that screws on. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AlexaA

customer_reviews.title: Happy Kitty
customer_reviews.text: I gave a small dose to my cat because he is normally extremely nervous when people come over. Instead of running away and hiding like usual, he stayed out in the living room and cuddled with his brother on the couch. Works great! I'm going to use this next time he needs to go to the vet or we are traveling with him.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: My Fur Babies Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to help my little 15-year old Chihuahua with her arthritis and her overall health in her old age. She loves it, and it has made a big difference! She no longer deals with arthritis pain and flies around the house like she's 10 years younger! As a proactive measure, I now give it all my other pets! Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: M. Labadie

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t help my pet
customer_reviews.text: My pet developed severe anxiety when we moved, shaking and not wanting us to leave. I was recommended this product, which unfortunately did nothing for him. Perhaps it helped some others and can help you, but not us. He seemed sad and lethargic. I only gave it 2 stars because he seemed to like the taste at least.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Winford

customer_reviews.title: Helped our Pup's Anxiety
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived when promised and well packed. Our pup had been extremely anxious since our older dog died--to the point of hyperventilating! We realized she had never been without a canine sibling. The hemp oil has made a tremendous difference! She's more her old self and I am thankful to see her feeling so much less anxious!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H

customer_reviews.title: See some improvements!!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this with my two dogs, 14 and 18 years old, and they seem to be improving. Peaches, 14 yo, has problems with her back legs and has trouble getting up some days. since she has been taking this she has a lot more energy and seems to have less pain in her legs. Daisy, 18 yo, was abused and starved before I adopted her so she has some problems that will never be fixed. However, she does seem to have a little more energy. I hope they continue to improve and would recommend people at least give this a try. I think it could help a lot of pets out there :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Gave my dog the comfort she needed prior to passing. Great product. Didnt even have to convince her to take it she just did (she was very picky.)
customer_reviews.author: Myriam Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Works great for persistent allergies
customer_reviews.text: I use hemp oil to treat my boxers allergies. He's constantly rashly and I was spending a fortune on meds from the vet that only gave short term results.Within 2 weeks of using hemp oil his rashes are healed and he's not scratching. I like that healthy pets requires a smaller dose, so you get more for your money. He is also less anxious the he had been. I love being able to help him naturally.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: We give this to our dogs and also some other supplements. I think the hemp oil is very good for them and they don't seem to mind the flavor in their food. It's a good supplement to give regularly to help with inflammation and it's also about prevention not just curing. I used it for my older dog and now that I have puppies I am giving it to them as well for preventative medicine.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Habert

customer_reviews.title: Helps Arthritic cat
customer_reviews.text: Very nice oil for my cat who is about 10 years old and has some arthritis and anxiety. Not sure if this has CBD oil in it which is what I wanted. She eats this mixed in her canned cat food. It does seem to help. I like that there are no additives with this brand, smells of earthy hemp. My cat gobbles this up when drizzled on top of her canned food. She seems upset if I don't give it to her, so it must help.
customer_reviews.author: lisa cardon

customer_reviews.title: Happy Rottie once again !
customer_reviews.text: The hemp oil is as it says. I noticed the first day my rottie used it. For the first time in weeks she is back to herself. Not chewing or scratching. I thank you and my rottie thanks you. 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: My Maltese has been getting very stressed to the point where he becomes slightly aggressive when being groomed. Haven’t tried it when he gets groomed but I gave him the appropriate dosage for 4th of July and he seems less tense. So far I’m satisfied with the product. Will have to see if it helped with his stress during grooming
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Not much of an improvement.
customer_reviews.text: My lab has severe anxiety. Prescription meds don’t really help much, so we thought we’d try this. It may have helped a little but not much of a difference that was very noticable. Went through entire bottle in almost 3 weeks. One full dropper as directed twice a day. Doesn’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: CELENA  P

customer_reviews.title: Great product to increase your animal's Health and Welfare.
customer_reviews.text: This works for our dogs and cats it seems to have mellowed them out reduced anxiety and help with Mobility for the older animals.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Amy LaBroad

customer_reviews.title: This Really does Help!
customer_reviews.text: This brand of Hemp really does help my small Yorkie with her seizures. So thankful and I'm sure she is also!!! Thank you for offering this product and, it was delivered on time, thanks again!!!
customer_reviews.author: love2shoponline

customer_reviews.title: Improved mobility for older dog
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in the hopes that it would increase the mobility of our aging black lab. He's 12 years old and has arthritis in his hips. We also have a 2 year old pit bull and our lab couldn't enjoy their time together outside much because of his limited mobility. Within a week of taking this hemp oil twice daily, he was running and taking the stairs and hills with no hesitation. It has really improved his quality of life and I will definitely continue to buy this product for him.
customer_reviews.author: VickieS

customer_reviews.title: I believe this works
customer_reviews.text: I've only given our dog a few doses and it could be coincidence but I think this could be the difference. He's been in pain from cervical disk degeneration and is on vet prescribed gabapentin, but he would always get uncomfortable between pills. So far, so good - hoping this will give him continued relief from pain.
customer_reviews.author: NancyG

customer_reviews.title: Optimistic about this medication!!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it for a few days, so I can’t really know how well it works. My older dog (dachshund) has some hip/back problems and was recommend I try it!! He loves the treats!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: I just received the product and have only used it one day so I can't say much about any results yet. However, dealing with this company has been wonderful. They even sent me an email to inform me what to expect when I get my product. I am using the oil as a recommendation for my dog and his allergies and am hopeful to have great results!
customer_reviews.author: Donna T

customer_reviews.title: No difference.
customer_reviews.text: No change. We used this for our very skittish dog with no change in his behavior. We even upped the dose gradually to see if he simply needed a bit more. Sadly, no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Pets Hemp Oil worked for our dog!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog was diagnosed with glaucoma in one eye. We started with prescribed eye drops from the vet, but our dog still would rub her eye with her paw. We started the Healthy Pets hemp oil and within a few days our dog stopped rubbing her eye. She was more relaxed. This hemp oil worked for us. We will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: javajunkies

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my cat having episodes of ...
customer_reviews.text: ...temporary back leg paralysis and ataxia (wobbly gait). Monitoring but since starting the oil (1 week ago), he’s had one episode that seemed less aggressive. I’ve not been tracking too long so this review is solely on the dampened episode of ataxia and paralysis.
customer_reviews.author: Kezza

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pain relief... my pup can be a pup-thank you
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped my American Bulldog with pain relief in his hip. He is only 1 and 1/2 years old but was diagnosed before he made one with OCD, he basically grew too fast. His Right hip has improved but still experiences pain- this product relieves his pain and allows him to play, run and live as a young dog should. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: DCB

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this great product
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped my English Mastiff with her arthritis. I give this along with other supplements twice a day and she's seems to have less pain and is moving (even running!) a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Granny B

customer_reviews.title: Improved movement in senior dog & better overall health
customer_reviews.text: I am giving my senior shar-pei 1/2 dropper per day, and after about 10 days of use I can see noticeable progress. He seems less stiff and achy, and more bright-eyed. He wrestles with his younger sister more. He seems less itchy too, he has a number of allergies that we have always been fighting. Overall very pleased at the improvement!
customer_reviews.author: FlutterbyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Works for our dog.
customer_reviews.text: Got this on Monday. Tried it that night to help calm our dog. She was hesitant at first, maybe because of the smell. She eventually ate her treat and within a short time was very calm and relaxed. She didnt even bark at having to go to sleep. Didn't have to muzzle her once.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Williams

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Been using Healthy Pets Hemp Oil for quite some time and I am very pleased with this product. I have a 12 year old Great Dane ,who receives the oil every morning and I know it has been helping her overall well being. 12 is very old for a Great Dane and although she is quite frail, there is fire in the hole! I also had another Dane that was having mild seizures every few months. Since l put her on the oil, a little more than a year ago, she has not had anymore seisures. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dawg Groomer

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical but it definitely works for our dog
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonders on our elderly Sheltie. She has been much more playful and active than before so it’s helping with her arthritis. Someone told us to try it and we figured why not ad we are so glad we did.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Improvement noticed
customer_reviews.text: My dog who normally LOVES car rides recently became anxious and started shaking whenever he would get in a vehicle. We also noticed this trend when we were getting ready to leave the house. He had not exhibited these behaviors in the past but was definitely suffering from some new anxiety. After some research, I decided to try this. In just over a week I have noticed an improvement. He still shakes some but not like he was before using the oil. I will continue to use it and hope for added improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Kary J

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use. I mix it in with my dog's food and they love it. I've noticed a difference in their energy levels and their eyes are getting clearer. I will definitely continue to get this for my pets.
customer_reviews.author: rebeca lyons

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This oil is amazing!! I have a 3 year old pitbull with anxiety and he is constantly whining. We gave him this oil one time and he was calm the rest of the evening. I was very surprised, we will be ordering more! I told my mom about it too because she has a pitbull with storm anxiety, she said she will be ordering some too! Thank you so much for the peace and quiet lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps her calm and easy going.
customer_reviews.text: We started our dog on this when she had late onset seizures. She panicked after the first seizures. Since we started her on seizure meds we also started her on CBD. She is calm and back to her old self. We keep her on a daily regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Peb

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! We adopted a dog with seizures from the local shelter. After trying the vet’s phenobarbital, we researched CBD oil and tried it. We stopped the phenobarbital, and started out giving our chiweenie the lowest dose. Her next seizure was milder so we increased her dose.... then her seizures just stopped. We give it to her nightly inside of a piece of hot dog. I always keep an emergency bottle on hand to ensure we never run out.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

product_meta.title: Valerio Pet Hemp Oil Dog Cat, Anxiety Relief, Arthritis Pain, Hip, Joint, Separation Anxiety, Stress, Seizures, Anti-Inflammatory, USDA Certified Organic Hemp Oil
feature_bullets: ✅ REDUCES INFLAMMATION AND PAIN : Our hemp oil drops naturally includes Vitamin E, Omega 3, 6 & 9 in each 300 mg bottle. All have been shown to dramatically help with inflammation and joint pain
✅ ORGANIC: Valerio Pet Hemp Oil is 100% Organic

✅ ANXIETY & STRESS RELIEF: Hemp seed oil is an all-natural option to relieve separation anxiety and distress. The seeds are the most powerful part of the plant when it comes to producing top quality oils that contain healthy levels of various essential fatty acids; Compounds known to affect cat and dog anxiety levels

✅ REDUCES THE RISK OF CANCER: Cancer in dogs and cats is tied to lack of Gamma Linolenic Acid (GLA). Our hemp oil is rich with essential fatty acids and Vitamin E, which can bring their bodies back to balanced, as well as increase immunity by removing free radicals

✅ SAFE AND EASY: Many dog medications and cat supplements have undesirable side effects and can sometimes decrease our pet’s quality of life. Our pet hemp oil is USDA CERTIFIED organic, COLD PRESSED, all-natural, non-toxic, and completely THC free (Your pet won't be "high")
